text: thæcring phwk than bucha rup pan xun ca kxallxh læa phwk than ku kar musa khun thæcring brrda thi phwk than bucha xun ca kxallxh nan man mimi xanac thi ca hı kheruxng yangchiph kæ phwk than dangnan cng khx kheruxng yangchiph ca kxallxh theid læa cng khearph phakdi phraxngkh læa cng khxbkhun tx phraxngkh yang phraxngkh theanan phwk than ca thuk na klab pi
